plot: Sick and tired of a living full of senseless crimes, a female vampire hires a modern vampire hunter who will fulfill her last will. However, the integrity and professionalism of the vampire slayer will be tested this time.
title: Sweet Blood
plot_es: Sick and tired of a living full of senseless crimes, a female vampire hires a modern vampire hunter who will fulfill her last will. However, the integrity and professionalism of the vampire slayer will be tested this time.
plot_en: Sick and tired of a living full of senseless crimes, a female vampire hires a modern vampire hunter who will fulfill her last will. However, the integrity and professionalism of the vampire slayer will be tested this time.
